pages.text: You have almost completed the first $(item)Simulation$(), good job!$(br2)To enter the next one you need to go back to the $(item)Portal Hub$() and enter the last piece of $(item)Faux Steel$() into the$(br)$(item)Portal Structure$().

pages.title: Portal Activator
pages.text: The item that activates the $(item)Portal$() to the second $(item)Simulation$() is the $(item)Engineering Hammer$() you made earlier in this $(item)Simulation$().
